name: Blackbox
desc: Advanced, modular media browser, file manager and playlist manager for mpv.

name: Colorbox
desc: Apply color correction presets.

name: copyTime
desc: Get the current time of the video and copy it to the clipboard with the format HH:MM:SS.MS .

name: Gallerizer
desc: Image gallery autoloader for mpv.

name: Leapfrog
desc: Effortlessly jump through your playlist, with your own custom jump size and direction, including the ability to jump randomly. Excellent when queuing lots of images and using mpv as an image viewer.

name: mpv-assrt
desc: , with interactive OSD menu.

name: screenshot-to-clipboard
desc: Generates a temp screenshot file on desktop then copy to clipboard. (Windows only)

name: seek-show-position
desc: Shows the position and duration when seeking formatted as 70:00 / 80:00 instead the built in 01:10:00 / 01:20:00.

name: takeSsSequence
desc: Take a sequence of equispaced screenshots.

name: TypeScript definitions (for developers)
desc: modules and globals.

name: VideoPlayerCode's Modules.js (for developers)
desc: API). All modules are free to use (and extend) in your own scripts!

name: webtorrent-mpv-hook
desc: Adds a hook that allows mpv to stream torrents. It also provides a osd overlay to show info/progress.

name: acompressor
desc: Dynamic range compressor using acompressor ffmpeg filter with controls to dynamically adjust parameters.

name: always-play-on-startup
desc: Always play on startup, never start playback in a paused state.

name: audio-balance
desc: Port of mpv's balance property to FFmpeg lavfi pan filter.

name: audio-file-keys
desc: Automatically apply key bindings when playing audio files.

name: autocrop
desc: Automatically crop the video by using lavfi's cropdetect filter to detect black bars.

name: autodeint
desc: Automatically deinterlace the video by using lavfi's idet filter to detect interlaced content.

name: auto-keep-gui-open
desc: Intelligently switches mpv's "keep-open" behavior based on whether you are running in video-mode or audio-only mode.

name: autoload
desc: Automatically load playlist entries before and after the currently playing file, by scanning the directory.

name: autoloop
desc: Automatically loops files that are under a given duration (default 5 seconds).

name: auto-profiles
desc: Automatically apply profiles based on predicates written as Lua expressions.

name: auto-save-state
desc: Periodically saves progress with write-watch-later-config, and also cleans up the watch later data after the file is finished playing (so playlists may continue at the correct file).

name: autosave
desc: Periodically saves "watch later" data during playback, rather than only saving on quit.

name: autospeed
desc: To adjust monitor refresh rate and video speed for almost 1:1 playback. (*nix)

name: autospeedwin
desc: To adjust monitor refresh rate and video speed for almost 1:1 playback. (Windows)

name: betterchapters
desc: Loads the next or previous playlist entry if there are no more chapters in the seek direction.

name: blackout
desc: A fast crossplatfrom boss-key, but without window minimization (and possible problems with some VO drivers).

name: blur-edges
desc: Replace black bars with a blurry copy of the video

name: bookmarker-menu
desc: but with a menu

name: bookmark
desc: Record and resume last play in current playing folder

name: boss-key
desc: Minimise and pause video at the same time. Windows/Linux. Eliminated the time lag in previous versions.

name: channel mixer
desc: A set of keybindings using a modifier (Shift or Ctrl) and the function keys (F8-F12) to can adjust the mixing level of surround channels on the fly.

name: chapterskip
desc: Automatically skip chapters based on title.

name: composition guides
desc: Overlay basic composition guides onto your video.

name: copyTime
desc: Get the current time of the video and copy it to the clipboard with the format HH:MM:SS.MS .

name: Tcl/Tk context menu
desc: Configurable context-menu based on Tcl/Tk, for *nix/Windows and probably macOS too.

name: clock
desc: Constantly show current time on the lower left corner of the video screen.

name: contact-sheet
desc: Display thumbnails of the current file in the style of a contact sheet

name: convert_script
desc: Script to quickly convert and crop videos from within mpv, with a GUI.

name: coverart
desc: Automatically load external music cover art

name: copy-permalink
desc: to clipboard. Useful for sharing when playing URLs.

name: crop
desc: Crop the video by defining the target rectangle with the cursor

name: curvesman
desc: Manipulate color curves filter of FFmpeg with hotkeys. Brighten up color, change color temperature/tone, hopefully more. Adjust yellow light tone to white light tone.

name: cycle-audio-device
desc: Cycle through available audio devices with key binds.

name: cycle-deinterlace-pullup
desc: Cycle between deinterlacing, pullup (IVTC), and both filters off.

name: cycle-denoise
desc: Cycle between lavfi's denoise filters (press n)

name: cycle_messages
desc: Cycle between custom OSD messages.

name: cycle-video-rotate
desc: Allows you to perform video rotation which perfectly cycles through all 360 degrees without any glitches.

name: delete-file
desc: Provides the ability to delete files being played through mpv

name: locate-file
desc: Locate current media file on your OS file browser

name: delogo
desc: It removes the logo of the channels in a video (press n)

name: deframe
desc: It removes the frame of youtube videos (press g)

name: drag-to-pan
desc: Pan the current video or image with the cursor.

name: drcbox
desc: Dynamic Audio Normalizer filter with visual feedback.

name: easycrop
desc: Manually crop a video during playback.

name: encode
desc: Re-encode or remux part of the current video. Can also preserve some filters, such as "crop".

name: equalizer
desc: 5-bands equalizer with colorful display.

name: excerpt
desc: Allows you to quickly create excerpts from media files, you just have to set begin and end markers.

name: exit-fullscreen
desc: , this script exits fullscreen mode when the playback reaches the end of file/playlist.

name: fastforward
desc: Instead of skipping forward in media files, speed up the playback for a few seconds.  Playback speed decays back to 1x after a few seconds.  Tap rapidly or hold down to go faster.

name: fast-forward
desc: Another fast-forward plugin with some added features and a bit more customization options.

name: filenavigator
desc: Navigate directories and open files from your system.

name: filter-test
desc: Test mpv/FFmpeg video filter(vf) strings with editable popup dialog.

name: find_subtitles
desc: (Down)load subtitles with subliminal.

name: firequalizer15
desc: Linear phase 15-bands equalizer.

name: fix_sub_timing
desc: Compute the correct speed/delay of subtitles by manually synching two points in time.

name: force-window-profile
desc: Applies the force-window profile when force-window is set (i.e. when starting mpv from the .desktop file)

name: fpsadjust
desc: mpv now has a native display-sync option.

name: gpufreq
desc: Show current and maximum GPU frequencies for GPUs using the DRM stack on Linux.

name: groupwatch_sync
desc: Quickly get back in sync with a group watch by adjusting playback speed.

name: histogram
desc: Exposes a configurable way to overlay ffmpeg histograms in mpv. There is a substantial amount of config available.

name: history-bookmark
desc: Create a history file to store the episode we watched last time. And let us easily jump to the video we watched last time.

name: KDialog-open-files
desc: Use KDE's KDialog to add files to playlist, subtitles to playing video or open URLs.

name: image-viewer
desc: Configurations, scripts and tips for using mpv as an image viewer.

name: interSubs
desc: Interactive subtitles. Instantly translate selected word/sentence. Works on Linux, macOS.

name: last.fm scrobbler
desc: for more info.

name: libass_sub_selector
desc: Visually select individual subtitles a la PotPlayer.

name: live-filters
desc: Add, remove or toggle ffmpeg video filters during mpv playback.

name: local-language
desc: Let the text displayed by mpv osd become the language you are most familiar with, that is, language localization, such as 【volume: 100%】 becomes 【音量:100%】.

name: lua-mpris
desc: Adds mpris support to mpv.

name: matroska-crop
desc: Automatically crop video using the Matroska PixelCrop properties. Includes optional workaround for hardware decoding.

name: mark-chapter
desc: Temporarily mark the current playback position as a chapter so you can seek to it later. Don't forget to edit input.conf to give it a keybinding.

name: createchapter
desc: but with ability to export valid xml file.

name: minesweeper
desc: Minesweeper game.

name: mpegts-truncate
desc: Removes beginning of MPEG TS file up to current position without re-writing the whole file.

name: mpv-acestream
desc: Add AceStream protocol handler to mpv. Let the user open streams by dropping Acestream links into mpv GUI or by passing them as command line argument.

name: mpv-bluetooth-av-delay
desc: Adds desired A-V delay automatically, if default audio sink is a bluetooth device.

name: mpv-bookmarker
desc: Bookmark your favorite time on media files

name: mpv-BoxToWide
desc: A simple mpv script to change 4:3 aspect-ratio of video files/streams to 16:9 automatically.

name: mpv-Change-OSD-Media-Title
desc: Displays filename, percentage watched, current chapter, and number of frames dropped in the OSD media title and updates it whenever one of the values has changed.

name: mpv_crop_script
desc: Take cropped screenshots directly within mpv, without the need for external dependencies.

name: mpv_discordRPC
desc: Discord RPC integration for mpv using lua-discordRPC as base.

name: mpv_discordRPC
desc: Discord Rich Presence integration for mpv Media Player. Added some features and support: Linux, MacOS and Windows.

name: mpv_frame_info
desc: Show frame info, similar to ffdshow's OSD.

name: mpv-history
desc: . Only tested on Windows.

name: mpv-i3-floating-centered
desc: Show mpv window in the center of the display when it is in floating mode (i3wm)

name: mpv_manager
desc: User script and shader manager for mpv

name: mpv-manga-reader
desc: Script for using mpv as a manga reader.

name: mpv-pdf
desc: View PDFs in mpv using ImageMagick.   Supports: Linux, MacOS

name: mpv_irc
desc: Display lines from an IRC channel or any text file.

name: mpv_sponsorblock
desc: Script to skip sponsored segments of YouTube videos.

name: mpv-ytdlAutoFormat
desc: A simple mpv LUA script to auto change ytdl-format for Youtube and Twitch or the domains you desire, to 480p or the quality you desire.

name: mpv2anki
desc: A simple way to add notes to Anki with Audio, screenshots and/or subtitles, with few dependencies.

name: mpvSockets
desc: : Linux, MacOS and Windows.

name: mpv_sort_script
desc: Sort files and directories by name, age, size or randomly, recursively or when coming across a directory.

name: mpv_slicing
desc: Cut uncompressed fragments of the video.

name: mpv_slicing_copying
desc: . It will cut fragments of the video in original format instead of RGB

name: mpv_thumbnail_script
desc: Show preview thumbnails when hovering over the seekbar, without the need for external dependencies.

name: mpv-txt
desc: Play text files using text-to-speech (TTS). (Works on Linux, MacOS; see Dependencies).

name: mpv-volnorm
desc: Client-server setup to provide EBU R.128 volume leveling to MPV, even if files stored on a server and played on multiple machines. (Works on Linux, probably all Unix-like; server in Perl).

name: mpvcontextmenu
desc: . Uses other scripts (see Requirements).

name: mpvmenu
desc: Adds a pop-up menu to mpv, which can be bound to a key or button

name: multi-command-if
desc: Very powerful conditional logic and multiple action engine for your keybindings, without having to write a single line of code!

name: multiloop
desc: Loop over multiple A-B points (and save them for future use)

name: multisocket
desc: Creates a numbered socket for each instance of mpv

name: myshows
desc: Marks currently watched episode on MyShows website.

name: nextfile
desc: Force opens next or previous file in the currently playing files directory.

name: notify
desc: Adds desktop notifications to the mpv media player, which show metadata like artist, album name and track name when the track changes.

name: notify-send
desc: A simpler and more recent notifications script for libnotify-compatible (i.e. Unix-like) notifications daemons only. Supports cover art.

name: oled-screensaver
desc: To prevent burn-ins on OLED TVs, this script fades-in a black screen after 15 seconds when paused in fullscreen.

name: ontop-playback
desc: Disables the ontop property when pausing, and enables it again when unpausing the video, if it was disabled. Change it only when the player is not in fullscreen to prevent screen flickering.

name: ontop-only-while-playing
desc:
Ontop is only active during video playback. Ontop is automatically disabled during idle, pause and is able
to be dynamically disabled without having to restart unlike the previous script.

name: open-imdb-page
desc: Opens the IMDb page that corresponds to the currently playing media file.

name: open-kinopoisk-page
desc: Opens the kinopoisk page that corresponds to the currently playing media file.

name: open-file-dialog
desc: (Windows) Launches a regular Windows file open dialog for loading videos.

name: osd-clock
desc: Periodically shows OSD clock (many configurable options).

name: pause-indicator
desc: Displays a momentary icon that flashes in the middle of the screen, similar to YouTube.

name: pause-when-minimize
desc: Pauses the player video when minimizing, and unpauses it when brought up again.

name: peerflix-hook
desc: Allows streaming of magnet links using peerflix, similar to youtube-dl.

name: mpv-peerflix-hook
desc: Alternate version of the above gist that works with multiple running peerflix instances and only kills the correct peerflix instance when exiting.

name: webtorrent-hook
desc: Allows streaming torrents using webtorrent (same as mpv-peerflix-hook but using webtorrent instead). Webtorrent-cli can play in mpv, but this script allows using torrent identifiers as the file argument to mpv or pasting them into the current playlist using one of the pasting scripts listed here.

name: persist-properties
desc: Keeps volume and other properties between sessions

name: pitchcontrol
desc: Adjusts audio pitch in half-tone steps.

name: playlistmanager
desc: This script allows you to see and interact with your playlist in an intuitive way.

name: playlistnoplayback
desc: If you enable the save play history and progress function, this lua script can solve the problem of automatically jumping to the previous playback progress when playing the next file when playing the playlist, that is, let the playlist always play the next file from the beginning every time. the limitations of this script, please see the comments section in the content.

name: playlist-view
desc: Display and navigate the playlist in a grid view of thumbnails.

name: progressbar
desc: A minimalistic OSC replacement. It provides a small, unintrusive progress bar that persists at the bottom of the video window.

name: quack
desc: Temporarily lower the volume after a seek to save your ears from unpleasant sudden volume changes.

name: quick-scale
desc: Quickly scale the video player to a target size, with full control over target scale and max scale. Helps you effortlessly resize a video to fit on your desktop, or any other video dimensions you need!

name: radio-title
desc: Automatically fetch current playing title from webradio website when not provided by stream.

name: recent
desc: directory, display using a hotkey or automatically when idle.

name: redshift_toggle
desc: Toggle redshift when loading a video file and when reaching the end of said file.

name: toggle-redshift-on-play
desc: Based on the above one, this one also re-enables redshift when pausing and disables it again when unpausing.

name: reload
desc: keybinding to reload video manually.

name: repl
desc: A REPL for input commands that is displayed on the video window.

name: rubberband_helper
desc: mpv --af=rubberband=help

name: save-sub-delay
desc: This script saves the sub-delay quantity for each file. When next time the file is opened, sub-delay is automatically restored.

name: seek-to
desc: Seek to an absolute timestamp specified via keyboard input.

name: scale-win
desc: Restore old "window-scale" behavior, so to make "add window-scale +/-" keybinds work again when any of the autofit-* options are defined.

name: show-filename
desc: Show the name of the current playing file.

name: show-stream-title
desc: Show OSD stream/channel title when switching the IPTV channels from m3u playlist.

name: simple-loader
desc: (Linux) Browse dirs and files on OSD, and launch them with mpv.

name: simple-mpv-webui
desc: Web-based remote control.

name: skipchapters
desc: Automatically skip chapters matching a given list of regular expressions (eg. "OP" or "Opening").

name: skiptofade
desc: Seeks forward until a black screen appears. Built to skip openings. Uses the lavfi blackdetect filter.

name: skiptosilence
desc: This script skips to the next silence in the file. The intended use for this is to skip until the end of an opening or ending sequence, at which point there's often a short period of silence.

name: SmartCopyPaste
desc: Powerful copy paste features. Paste URL or local videos directly to mpv. Copy URL or currently playing video in mpv player then paste to access at a later time. Add videos to playlist simply by pasting. Much more explained in the link above.

name: SmartCopyPaste-II
desc: . Paste URL or local videos directly to mpv. Copy URL or currently playing video in mpv player then paste to access at a later time. Bookmark video and its time by copying then paste to access bookmark. Much more explained in the link above.

name: SmartHistory
desc: . Optional resume by [ctrl]+[r] for all videos you have played (auto bookmark). Immediately play last opened video by [ctrl]+[l]. Much more explained in the link above.

name: SimpleUndo
desc: Simple undo feature. If you accidentally seek/jump to a different time in the video, press undo [ctrl]+[z] to return to your previous time and vice-versa. More details in the link above.

name: UndoRedo
desc: Undo and Redo feature for mpv.  If you seek/jump to a different time in the video, press undo [ctrl]+[z] to linearly undo the seeks/jumps in the video, and press redo [ctrl]+[y] to linearly return to previous undo positions. More details in the link above.

name: sopcast
desc: Adds support for sop:// urls.

name: speed-transition
desc: Increases playback speed if a subtitle will not be displayed soon. Resumes normal speed just before the subtitle shows up.

name: speed-transition-Audio
desc: . changes playback speed based on volume thresholds.

name: speed
desc: Changing speed based on regex of filename/path.

name: speed
desc: Always show current playback speed on the OSD

name: splice
desc: A script that helps you create a video out of cuts made in the current playing video.

name: spotify
desc: Add current playing title to an user defined Spotify playlist.

name: sub
desc: Select subtitle by id via input box (Windows)

name: subit
desc: Yet another script for downloading subtitles using subliminal. Supports better customization of options, such as easy language selection, authentication for providers that need it, and support for URLs.

name: subselect Tk
desc: Download subtitles with a GUI - select the one you want and automatically load them up in mpv. Supports searching for arbitrary names and different subtitle languages. Works on Windows and Linux, possibly macOS.

name: subside
desc: make subtitles go in a browser window (linux only)

name: sub-cut
desc: Extract a part of the video as audio or video with subtitles.

name: sub-bilingual
desc: Generate bilingual subtitles.

name: sub-bookmarks
desc: Save current position and subtitles in .txt file.

name: sub-export
desc: Extract selected subtitles from .mkv file.

name: sub-playback
desc: Add interactive move, i.e. automatically pause at the end of the fragment with option to continue playback or replay it again with or without subtitles.

name: sub-replay
desc: Replay previous sentence.

name: sub-search
desc: Search for phrase in subtitles and skip to it.

name: sub-sentences
desc: Generate subtitles with sentences.

name: sub-voracious
desc: Reading and listening practice.

name: subs2srs
desc: Automatically add new card in Anki with audio, picture and text.

name: stats
desc: Display some statistics about the currently played file on-screen.

name: streamcache
desc: Provides for more network-glitch-robust caching of live streams by adjusting replay speed.

name: time
desc: Shows the current time or the time at which playback will end.

name: timer
desc: Allows the user to set a starting time and an ending time and see the time elapsed between those points with millisecond precision.

name: trackselect
desc: Automatically select your preferred tracks based on title.

name: tree-profiles
desc: Automatically apply profiles to certain directories or files.

name: trim.lua
desc: Create a trim of video files without transcoding. Utilizes ffprobe to fetch accurate keyframes.

name: total_playtime
desc: Shows total playtime of current playlist.

name: trueautosub
desc: . (osx/linux only)

name: tts-subs
desc: on MacOS.  Could be adapted to use espeak.  PR for windows support welcome.)

name: tv-output
desc: (Linux) TV output handling - activate on mpv playback and deactivate on mpv shutdown.

name: unseen-playlistmaker
desc: Keeps track of watched files locally, and creates playlists of unwatched files.

name: visualizer
desc: Various audio visualization.

name: vo_battery
desc: (Linux) Choose the VO based on if the laptop is on battery or not.

name: vr-reversal
desc: View 3D side-by-side video as a 2D video, allows you to look around and zoom within the video, logs the head motions to a file for later rendering out to a 2D video with ffmpeg.

name: webm
desc: Simple WebM maker for mpv, with no external dependencies.

name: when-to-loop
desc: Intelligently decide when mpv should loop, i.e. while shuffling or while playing a short file.

name: xrandr
desc: Automatically sets the display refresh rate to the one best suitable for the video played

name: Yomichampv
desc: A simple solution for integration with Yomichan - a browser-based japanese dictionay.

name: youtube-quality
desc: A menu for changing youtube video quality (ytdl-format) on the fly, as though you were using the web player.

name: youtube-upnext
desc: A menu for (auto) playing youtube's "up next"/recommended videos, that show up on the right side on the website.

name: ytdl prefetch resolver
desc: Resolves the next url in the playlist using ytdl before the current file reaches the end. Using --prefetch-playlist along side this it allows i.e. youtube data to begin loading into cache ahead of time.

name: zones
desc: Handles commands depending on where the mouse pointer is at, mostly for mouse wheel handling.

name: abs-screenshot
desc: Uses Exiftool to get the "Date/Time Original" and saves a screenshot with the name being the actual time the video was taken.

name: addfile
desc: (OS X) Add subtitle or audio track to playing video file

name: Anime4K
desc: A series of shaders designed to scale and enhance anime. Includes shaders for line sharpening, artefact removal, denoising, upscaling, and more.

name: LumaSharpenHook
desc: A sharpen filter similar to using Unsharp Mask in Photoshop ported from SweetFX shader pack.

name: SSimDownscaler, SSimSuperRes, Krig, Adaptive Sharpen, etc.
desc: SSimDownscaler, SSimSuperRes, Krig, Adaptive Sharpen, etc.

name: Noise
desc: Simplistic filter that adds a tunable amount of uniform white noise to the output.

name: Film Grain v1
desc: by just adding it to the list of hooks.

name: Antiringing
desc: This is an antiringing filter that works by clamping to the local neighbourhood. Sort of inspired by the mpv built-in antiringing algorithm, but it's extended in such a way that it also works well for polar (EWA) filters, which the mpv built-in algorithm does not support at all.

name: nnedi3 and ravu
desc: User shaders for prescaling.

name: FSRCNN
desc: Prescaler based on layered convolutional networks.

name: un360
desc: Converts equirectangular 360 degree video to be watchable, at a fixed perspective.

name: acme-0.5x
desc: Fastest 0.5x downscaler for mpv, useful for 4K video playback on FHD screen (bypass chroma upscaling and color conversion in 4K resolution).

name: lensfix
desc: Fix radial distortion commonly found in wide angle action cameras.

name: hyperview
desc: Dynamic stretching filter aiming to bring effects similar to GoPro SuperView.

name: mvtools
desc: 's BlockFPS function to perform motion interpolation on the video in realtime.

name: nnedi3
desc: to double the resolution of the video. This always performs a single doubling. Note that the vapoursynth-nnedi3 filter is so slow that this practically can't be used in realtime, so it's not much use in practice.

name: flash3kyuu
desc: mpv now ships with a similar debanding filter as shader.

name: mpv-mpris
desc: Adds support for MPRIS2 protocol

name: mpv-libunity
desc: Shows a progress bar on your panel/dock using libunity

name: shutup
desc: Set --quiet when stderr or stdout aren't connected to a terminal

name: play-with
desc: A WebExtension that can open a video stream on a web page with an external player.

name: playphrase
desc: Search and play phrases from movies and audiobooks.
